channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 新加坡总理李显龙敦促年轻夫妇多生孩子，因为这个城市国家正在与出生率下降作斗争
item.description: Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong urged young couples to have more babies as the city state battles with a declining birth rate trib.al/DV6g6eh

item.title: 澳大利亚将把自制航空战斗无人机项目的投资额提高 2.59 亿澳元，这也是澳大利亚军方更广泛改革的一部分。
item.description: Australia will increase its investment in a homemade aviation combat drone program by $259 million as part of a broader overhaul of the country’s military which has seen the government clash with senior defense figures trib.al/asmQlNP

item.title: 由于厄尔尼诺现象的影响弱于预期，秘鲁经济可能最终走出本世纪最严重的衰退期
item.description: Peru's economy could finally be emerging from its worst recession this century due to weaker-than-expected impact from El Nino trib.al/eZbDzH2

item.title: 据知情人士透露，Senoko Energy 的大股东正在考虑出售其在这家新加坡电力公司的股份，寻求高达 30 亿美元的估值。
item.description: The majority shareholders of Senoko Energy are considering selling their stakes in the Singapore-based power firm, seeking a valuation of as much as $3 billion, sources say. trib.al/liNLo2R

item.title: 消息人士称，曾是中国恒大离岸债务主要持有者的 Ashmore 集团去年年底完全退出了对这家陷入困境的房地产开发商的投资
item.description: Ashmore Group once a major holder of China Evergrande's offshore debt, fully exited its investment in the embattled property developer late last year, sources say trib.al/TAHOgxS

item.title: 拜登政府正在考虑限制中国 "智能汽车 "及相关零部件的进口，这将超出关税范围，以解决美国对数据安全日益增长的担忧。
item.description: The Biden administration is considering restrictions on imports of Chinese `smart cars' and related components that would go beyond tariffs to address growing US concerns about data security trib.al/bIicrXW

item.title: Genesis Global 已就纽约最高执法官员提起的诉讼达成和解，纽约最高执法官员指控这家破产的加密货币贷款公司欺诈客户，该公司与双子座信托公司（Gemini Trust）共同运营的 Gemini Earn 项目现已终止。
item.description: Genesis Global has settled a lawsuit brought by New York’s top law enforcement official alleging the bankrupt crypto lender defrauded customers of its now-terminated Gemini Earn program, which was run jointly with Gemini Trust trib.al/V891ZnK

item.title: 消息人士称，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）已放弃在香港的部分办公空间，这是全球银行为节约成本而缩减办公空间给香港商业地产市场带来的最新挫折。
item.description: Goldman Sachs has given up some office space in Hong Kong, sources say, the latest setback to the city’s commercial real estate market as global banks trim space to save costs trib.al/j9fZPJ1

item.title: 在中国长达十年的扩张狂潮中收购的新一批海外资产开始进入市场。这些资产的出售价格可能显示了整个行业正面临着多大的麻烦
item.description: A new batch of overseas assets acquired in a decade-long Chinese expansion spree are starting to hit the market. The sale prices may show how much trouble the wider industry is in trib.al/bBjEKuL

item.title: 在岸人民币走软的压力正在增大，政策制定者的非官方底线已被突破。
item.description: Pressure is building on the onshore yuan to weaken past an unofficial line in the sand for policymakers and this time traders are keeping as close an eye on happenings in Japan as they are Stateside trib.al/pIWsmtx

item.title: #5Things：早上好。中国股市在农历新年前暂停震荡。标普500指数在5000点里程碑附近徘徊。习近平和普京讨论合作反对外国干涉。以下是市场动向。
item.description: #5Things: Good morning. The Chinese equity whipsaw pauses before the Lunar New Year. The S&P 500 hovers near the 5,000 milestone. Xi and Putin discuss cooperating to oppose foreign interference. Here’s what’s moving markets. trib.al/edtI3jk

item.title: 秘鲁将利率降至一年半以来的最低水平，原因是通胀放缓幅度超过预期，经济萎缩。
item.description: Peru cut interest rates to the lowest level in a year and a half as inflation slows more than expected and the economy contracts. trib.al/MBq6u11

item.title: 就在哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）试图从国会大败的阴影中走出来的时候，华尔街最大的几家银行将访问阿根廷。
item.description: Some of Wall Street’s largest banks are set to visit Argentina just as Javier Milei tries to come back from a massive defeat in Congress. trib.al/sKAkcno

item.title: 政治派别两派的大法官都质疑科罗拉多州能否将唐纳德-特朗普排除在选票之外：晚间简报
item.description: Justices on both sides of the political spectrum questioned whether Colorado could keep Donald Trump off the ballot: Here’s your Evening Briefing trib.al/0x9tZaR

item.title: 生物技术公司 Kyverna Therapeutics 在首次交易中大涨 36%，成为今年表现最好的公司之一
item.description: Biotech Kyverna Therapeutics surges 36% in one of the year's best showings in a trading debut trib.al/zPlLy3c

item.title: 了解全球市场的最新动态
item.description: Get up to speed on what's moving global markets trib.al/wTWrgQp

item.title: 新西兰的抵押贷款利率开始下降，不过借款人可能要到 2024 年底才能明显感觉到利率的下降。
item.description: New Zealand mortgage interest rates are beginning to drop, although it may be late 2024 before borrowers notice meaningful declines. trib.al/gd1OszM

item.title: 杰里米-亨特对建立一个投资英国股票的免税储蓄账户--即所谓的英国 ISA--的想法 "非常感兴趣
item.description: Jeremy Hunt is “very attracted” to the idea of creating a tax-free savings account for investing in British stocks — a so-called British ISA trib.al/FLKFF5Z

item.title: RT by @markets：@Allstate 如何优先考虑人工智能、数据并利用分析技术解决其最关键的业务问题？@Bloomberg Intelligence 的 Anurag Rana 在 #TheFutureInvestor 上与 Eric Huls 进行了对话。
item.description: How is @Allstate prioritizing AI, data, and using analytics to solve its most critical business problems?@Bloomberg Intelligence’s Anurag Rana talks with Eric Huls at #TheFutureInvestor. bloom.bg/48Y90Na

item.title: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西两家最大的银行将支付公司 Cielo 私有化的计划面临少数股东的反对，他们计划通过谈判争取更高的价格。
item.description: A plan by two of Brazil’s largest banks to take payments company Cielo private faces pushback from minority stakeholders who are planning to negotiate for a higher price, according to people familiar with the matter. trib.al/rb0INSX

item.title: 美国最高金融监管机构已开始调查高盛（Goldman Sachs）在执行部分客户期货交易时是否不当收取费用。
item.description: A top US financial regulator has opened an investigation into whether Goldman Sachs improperly charged fees to execute some of its clients’ futures trades trib.al/yCTth31

item.title: 墨西哥折扣零售商 Tiendas 3B 的所有者收到的首次公开募股（IPO）订单超过了可用股票的数量，此前该公司扩大了上市规模，为公司和一批股东筹集了多达 5.89 亿美元的资金。
item.description: The owner of Mexican discount retailer Tiendas 3B has received more orders for its IPO than there are shares available, after the listing was enlarged to raise as much as $589 million for the company and a group of shareholders. trib.al/ULDqDUO

item.title: 对于等待买房的人来说，有一些令人鼓舞的迹象。但先不要抱太大希望
item.description: There are encouraging signs for people waiting to buy a home. But don’t get your hopes up just yet trib.al/FcEFzpa

item.title: 劳动力市场专家称，与人工智能的快速发展相关的裁员可能比我们知道的还要多
item.description: More job cuts are likely tied to rapid advances in AI than we know about, labor market experts say trib.al/TD6KVTW

item.title: 西好莱坞新建的一栋公寓楼租金高得吓人，但该物业的贷款方--KKR 房地产投资信托基金--却将其列入了观察名单，因为业主要应对自 2022 年以来飙升的借贷成本的重压
item.description: A newly built West Hollywood apartment building is commanding sky-high rents, but the property's lender — a KKR REIT — has it on a watchlist as the owner deals with the weight of borrowing costs that have surged since 2022 trib.al/44mtiMT

item.title: 根据美国经济谘商委员会（Conference Board）的数据，美国公司首席执行官的情绪指数两年来首次转为积极。
item.description: An index of sentiment among CEOs of US companies has turned positive for the first time in two years, according to the Conference Board. trib.al/eh5fXSF

item.title:
纽约巨人队 @kayvont 说，他希望能在波霸冰淇淋大行其道之前就投资它。
在本周的《教训与投资》节目中，他向我们讲述了他收到第一笔 700 万美元薪水的故事
item.description:
New York Giants @kayvont says he wishes he could've invested boba ice cream before it got big.

He tells us about receiving his first $7 million paycheck on this week’s Lessons and Investments trib.al/bFS1kRU

item.title: 英国工党斥资 280 亿英镑实施绿色政策的承诺终于落空。那么，他们提出了哪些替代方案呢？与@Hariboconomics 一起了解详情
item.description: The UK Labour Party's pledge to spend £28 billion on green policies is finally dead. So what are they proposing instead? Get The Readout with @Hariboconomics trib.al/t9d0AE3

item.title: 盈利强于预期，促使大西洋两岸的公司以迅雷不及掩耳之势宣布股票回购
item.description: Stronger-than-expected earnings are leading companies on both sides of the Atlantic to announce share buybacks at a blistering pace trib.al/C3dywYM

item.title: 在美联储可能在一段时间内保持政策稳定的信号下，美国抵押贷款利率走高
item.description: Mortgage rates in the US inched higher amid signals that the Federal Reserve is likely to keep its policy steady for some time trib.al/doy05pL
